text: [Music]
I'm James mson I'm the director of
Digital Services and technology for the
driver and vehicle standards agency the
driver and vehicle standard agency
improves Road Safety in Britain and we
do that by setting standards and
ensuring compliance with those standards
and we deliver a number of services that
you'd recognize such as the driving test
andot service on AWS we're currently
running the mot service that's a
national government service it processes
around 42 million mot transactions per
year the main benefits of using AWS is
the scalability the availability and the
ability to scale workloads up and down
that leads to cost savings to the agency
later this year we will be launching our
next service through AWS and that's the
commercial vehicle operator Licensing
Service
[Music]
